problem.markdown:
>>As the height of a SDOF system increases what happens to the frequency of the system?<<
( ) As the height increases, the frequency of a SDOF system increases (x) As the height increases, the frequency of a SDOF system decreases ( ) As the height increases, the frequency of a SDOF system remains the same
[explanation] As the height increases, the stiffness of the column decreases, causing the frequency (or rate of oscillations) to decrease as well. [explanation]
problem.p: As the height of a SDOF system increases what happens to the frequency of the system?

choicegroup.label: As the height of a SDOF system increases what happens to the frequency of the system?
choicegroup.choice: As the height increases, the frequency of a SDOF system increases
As the height increases, the frequency of a SDOF system decreases
As the height increases, the frequency of a SDOF system remains the same

div.p: As the height increases, the stiffness of the column decreases, causing the frequency (or rate of oscillations) to decrease as well.
